title: Tree Agate: Sacred Ayurvedic Stone Of Harmony & Inner Peace
description: Tree Agate is thought to clear and balance the movement of energy through the body's pathways, a system of channels called the nadis. Revered...
cleaned_text: Description Please note that Tree Agate can form in a wide variety of greens and whites. Your stone will be chosen intuitively, and may or may not look like the specimens pictured here. Color variations vary greatly with this crystal and should be expected.
